title: Sarah
description: What could be better than a free Changeling online magazine? Free stories in our free magazine!In this day of inflated gas prices and living expenses, don't you think it's time you got something back? How about a fantasy meeting in an abandoned room or a brief encounter in a Mercedes-Benz? How about a trip into the exotic with the lover that sets your passions ablaze? You earned it! You deserve it. And we're going to give it to you! ENCOUNTERS, our ezine features two to six page short stories from Changeling authors. The rules are simple. One encounter -- and nothing that will get us arrested. And best of all, they're free! Check out Cheeky Changeling for your chance encounter with the lover who'll make your soul weep. And did we mention they're free?
author: Jessica Coulter Smith
